body_html:
Can you try with conda instead ? conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith
I think the problem is that openMP is not installed and only conda can manage this kind of external dependency. BTW I agree it should work with pip if it's advertised, this problem might be related to the new 0.1.10 only, @soumith will have the answer.

body:
Can you try with conda instead ? `conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith` 
I think the problem is that openMP is not installed and only conda can manage this kind of external dependency. BTW I agree it should work with pip if it's advertised, this problem might be related to the new 0.1.10 only, @soumith will have the answer.
